name: Patch Bolt
description:
Patch Bolt A 3D Platformer featuring a tiny robot in a big house! Collect all the 4 Golden Bolts to win the game! Features & Info
  • This project was originally created as a school project for College!
  • Programmed in C# using Unity.
  • Around 30 minutes of gameplay to 100% complete it.
  • Multiple objects to collect!
